text:
Something seems to have gone wrong with the signature generation, because the .asc signature files under [1] are all binary, rather than Ascii-armoured as is usual.

The sigs that I checked do still work for me as the tool I use (gpg2) does not seem to care, but it's not obvious that they will work in all cases as the content-type is wrong.

[1] http://www.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-7/v7.0.0-beta/
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Thanks. Should be fixed now. Give the mirrors 24 to sync the changes and re-open if there is still an issue.
